price: 81 Il vous expose clairement Ses signes. Lequel des signes d’Allah allez-vous donc rejeter ?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wayurīkum āyātihi fa-ayya āyāti al-lahi tunkirūna
